M-2 Los Angeles Television (Study #2) - Dallas W. Smythe and Angus Campbell
A comprehensive study of the programs carried by the Los Angeles
television stations during the period Nhy 23-29, 1951- 94 PP* Paper.

M-3 Chicago Summer Television (Study #3) - Hans 0. Mauksch, Donald Horton and
Kurt Lang. A comprehensive study of the programs carried by the
Chicago television stations on August 5, 1951* 73 PP* Paper. $3.00.
(Special price to NAEB members - $1.00.)
M-4 New Haven Television (Study #5) - Dallas W. Smythe
A comprehensive study of the programs carried by the New Haven
television station during the period May 15-21, 1952. 119 pp. Paper.
$3*00. (Special price to NAEB members - $1.00.)
M-5 Three Years of New York Television (Study -//6) - Dallas W. Smythe
A comprehensive study of the programs carried by the New York City
television stations during the period January 4-10, 1953 and compared
with January 4-10, 1951 and 1952. l6l pp. Paper. $3.00. (Special
price to NAEB members - $1.00.)
M-6 Four Years of New York Television (Study #7) - H. H. Remmers (Purdue Opinion
PanelJ. A comprehensive study of the programs carried by the New. York
City television stations during the period January 25-31, 1954 and
compared with the three previous years. 92 pp. Paper. $3.00.
(Special price to NAEB members - $1.00.)
